background.en:
TYK combines fintech and software engineering expertise, transforming complex market behaviors and product requirements into efficient data flows and robust systems. With a background in banking MA and trading room research, TYK now specializes in backend architecture design, performance optimization, and rapid product deployment.

TYK's technical expertise includes Spring Boot, Django, and FastAPI framework development, multi-threading and WebSocket real-time communication, advanced database indexing (PostgreSQL, MSSQL) and high-concurrency cache strategies using Redis and Lua scripts. Experience covers fixing N+1 query issues, managing multi-source connection pools (HikariCP), implementing distributed locks to ensure data consistency under heavy load, and Redis session management. TYK is also proficient in orchestrating containerized deployments using Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines. Additionally, TYK has experience designing and optimizing LLM pipelines (e.g., RetrievalQAChain) to achieve low-latency, high-accuracy responses, and building hybrid search systems combining trigram and vector search technologies.

TYK's personal website contains a complete skill map — feel free to reach out via email, and TYK will respond promptly.

background.zh:
TYK 結合金融科技與軟體工程專長，能將複雜市場行為與產品需求轉化為高效數據流程與穩健系統。具備銀行 MA 與交易室研究背景，現專精於後端架構設計、效能優化與產品快速落地。

TYK 的技術專業包括 Spring Boot、Django 與 FastAPI 框架開發、多執行緒與 WebSocket 即時通訊、進階資料庫索引（PostgreSQL、MSSQL）與高併發快取策略（Redis 與 Lua 腳本）。經驗涵蓋修復 N+1 查詢問題、管理多源連線池（HikariCP），以及實作分布式鎖以確保高負載下的資料一致性，並具備 Redis session 管理經驗。亦擅長使用 Docker、Kubernetes 與 CI/CD 管道協調容器化部署。此外，TYK 具備設計與優化 LLM 管道（如 RetrievalQAChain）以實現低延遲、高準確度回應的經驗，並建構混合搜尋系統結合 trigram 與向量搜尋技術。

TYK 的個人網站包含完整的技能圖譜 — 歡迎來信交流，TYK 會盡快回覆。

https://peoplesystem.tatdvsonorth.com/tymultiverse/about
